channel.title: Genie & the Magic Lamp
channel.description:
Interesting podcasts by Singapore's first blogger-singer-songwriter, Genie, which talk about her musical journey, blogging and lots more!
-> Published using HitRSS.com

item.title: Chinese edition of Genie & The Magic Lamp Christmas Special
item.description:
This is a special Chinese edition of Genie & The Magic Lamp podcast, where Genie talks about her new charity album in aid of the Salvation Army, "Because of Love".

Published using FREE HitRSS

item.title: Special Christmas Edition of Genie & The Magic Lamp Podcast
item.description:
In this special Christmas edition, Genie talks about her new album "Because of Love" in aid of the Salvation Army.

Published using FREE HitRSS

item.title: 2nd episode of Genie & The Magic Lamp Podcast
item.description:
In this 2nd episode of Genie & The Magic Lamp Podcast, Genie talks about her blog site, www.genie.sg

Published using FREE HitRSS

item.title: Pilot episode of Genie & the Magic Lamp Podcast
item.description:
This is the pilot episode of a series of interesting podcasts by Genie and her sidekick, the Magic Lamp. In this episode, you'll get to hear a brief introduction of Genie and get a taste of Genie's songs.

Published using FREE HitRSS
